GOTY 2018

God of War

Developer: Santa Monica Studio

Genre: Action/Adventure

Platforms: Playstation 4/5, PC

God of War, a modern reboot of the classics by the same name, was an inevitable next step forward for the franchise. It features a new over-the-shoulder camera with more fluid combat, along with a gripping and beautiful story of father and son that serves to give much needed character development to the protagonist, Kratos.
